Protocols/RVS_GTServiceDelegate.html#/s:.name: gtService(_:errorEncountered:)
Protocols/RVS_GTServiceDelegate.html#/s:.abstract: Called when an error is encountered by a single service.

Protocols/RVS_GTServiceDelegate.html#/s:.name: gtService(_:dicoveredCharacteristic:)
Protocols/RVS_GTServiceDelegate.html#/s:.abstract: Called when a new characteristic has been added to the service.

Protocols/RVS_GTDriverDelegate.html#/s:1.name: gtDriver(_:errorEncountered:)
Protocols/RVS_GTDriverDelegate.html#/s:1.abstract: Called when an error is encountered by the main driver.

Protocols/RVS_GTDriverDelegate.html#/s:1.name: gtDriver(_:peripheralDiscovered:)
Protocols/RVS_GTDriverDelegate.html#/s:1.abstract: Called when a peripheral is discovered, and before a device instance is instantiated.

Protocols/RVS_GTDriverDelegate.html#/s:1.name: gtDriver(_:newDeviceAdded:)
Protocols/RVS_GTDriverDelegate.html#/s:1.abstract: Called when a device has been added and instantiated.

Protocols/RVS_GTDriverDelegate.html#/s:1.name: gtDriverStatusUpdate(_:)
Protocols/RVS_GTDriverDelegate.html#/s:1.abstract: Called to indicate that the driver’s status should be checked.

Protocols/RVS_GTDeviceDelegate.html#/s:1.name: gtDevice(_:errorEncountered:)
Protocols/RVS_GTDeviceDelegate.html#/s:1.abstract: Called when an error is encountered by a single device.

Protocols/RVS_GTDeviceDelegate.html#/s:1.name: gtDeviceWillBeRemoved(_:)
Protocols/RVS_GTDeviceDelegate.html#/s:1.abstract: Called when a device is about to be removed.

Protocols/RVS_GTDeviceDelegate.html#/s:1.name: gtDevice(_:wasDisconnected:)
Protocols/RVS_GTDeviceDelegate.html#/s:1.abstract: Called when a device was disconnected for any reason.

Protocols/RVS_GTDeviceDelegate.html#/s:1.name: gtDevice(_:discoveredService:)
Protocols/RVS_GTDeviceDelegate.html#/s:1.abstract: Called when a device discovers a new service

Protocols/RVS_GTDeviceDelegate.html#/s:1.name: gtDeviceStatusUpdate(_:)
Protocols/RVS_GTDeviceDelegate.html#/s:1.abstract: Called to indicate that the device’s status should be checked.

Protocols/RVS_GTDriverDelegate.html.name: RVS_GTDriverDelegate
Protocols/RVS_GTDriverDelegate.html.abstract: A delegate object is required to instantiate an instance of the driver class.

Classes/RVS_GTService.html#/s:16RVS_GTDr.name: sequence_contents
Classes/RVS_GTService.html#/s:16RVS_GTDr.abstract: This is an Array of our discovered characteristics, as represented by instances of RVS_GTCharacteristic.

Classes/RVS_GTService.html#/s:16RVS_GTDr.name: Element
Classes/RVS_GTService.html#/s:16RVS_GTDr.abstract: The element type is our characteristic class.

Classes/RVS_GTService.html#/s:16RVS_GTDr.name: delegate
Classes/RVS_GTService.html#/s:16RVS_GTDr.abstract: This is our delegate instance. It can be nil.

Classes/RVS_GTDriver/Errors.html#/s:16RV.name: bluetoothNotAvailable
Classes/RVS_GTDriver/Errors.html#/s:16RV.abstract: This is returned if the manager can’t power on.

Classes/RVS_GTDriver/Errors.html#/s:16RV.name: connectionAttemptFailed(error:)
Classes/RVS_GTDriver/Errors.html#/s:16RV.abstract: This is returned if we cannot connect to the device.

Classes/RVS_GTDriver/Errors.html#/s:16RV.name: connectionAttemptFailedNoDevice
Classes/RVS_GTDriver/Errors.html#/s:16RV.abstract: This is returned if we connected, but no device was available. This should never happen.

Classes/RVS_GTDriver/Errors.html#/s:16RV.name: disconnectionAttemptFailed(error:)
Classes/RVS_GTDriver/Errors.html#/s:16RV.abstract: This is returned if we cannot disconnect from the device.

Classes/RVS_GTDriver/Errors.html#/s:16RV.name: unknownDisconnectionError
Classes/RVS_GTDriver/Errors.html#/s:16RV.abstract: This is a catchall error for a disconnection issue

Classes/RVS_GTDriver/Errors.html#/s:16RV.name: unknownPeripheralDiscoveryError(error:)
Classes/RVS_GTDriver/Errors.html#/s:16RV.abstract: This is a catchall error for peripheral discovery

Classes/RVS_GTDriver/Errors.html#/s:16RV.name: characteristicValueMissing
Classes/RVS_GTDriver/Errors.html#/s:16RV.abstract: This means that we did not get a characteristic value

Classes/RVS_GTDriver/Errors.html#/s:16RV.name: unknownCharacteristicsDiscoveryError(error:)
Classes/RVS_GTDriver/Errors.html#/s:16RV.abstract: This is a catchall error for characteristics discovery

Classes/RVS_GTDriver/Errors.html#/s:16RV.name: unknownCharacteristicsReadValueError(error:)
Classes/RVS_GTDriver/Errors.html#/s:16RV.abstract: This is a catchall error for characteristics value read

Classes/RVS_GTDriver/Errors.html#/s:16RV.name: localizedDescription
Classes/RVS_GTDriver/Errors.html#/s:16RV.abstract: The localized description is a simple slug that can be used to key a client-supplied message.

Classes/RVS_GTDriver/Errors.html.name: Errors
Classes/RVS_GTDriver/Errors.html.abstract: These are the various errors that can be returned by this class.

Classes/RVS_GTDevice.html#/c:@CM@RVS_GTD.name: peripheral(_:didModifyServices:)
Classes/RVS_GTDevice.html#/c:@CM@RVS_GTD.abstract: Called when the device changed its service listing.

Classes/RVS_GTDevice.html#/c:@CM@RVS_GTD.name: peripheral(_:didDiscoverServices:)
Classes/RVS_GTDevice.html#/c:@CM@RVS_GTD.abstract: Called when we have discovered services for the peripheral.

Classes/RVS_GTDevice.html#/c:@CM@RVS_GTD.name: peripheral(_:didDiscoverCharacteristicsFor:error:)
Classes/RVS_GTDevice.html#/c:@CM@RVS_GTD.abstract: Called when we have discovered characteristics for a service.

Classes/RVS_GTDevice.html#/c:@CM@RVS_GTD.name: peripheral(_:didUpdateNotificationStateFor:error:)
Classes/RVS_GTDevice.html#/c:@CM@RVS_GTD.abstract: Called when a characteristic state has changed.

Classes/RVS_GTDevice.html#/c:@CM@RVS_GTD.name: peripheral(_:didUpdateValueFor:error:)
Classes/RVS_GTDevice.html#/c:@CM@RVS_GTD.abstract: Called when a characteristic state has changed.

Classes/RVS_GTDevice.html#/c:@CM@RVS_GTD.name: peripheralDidUpdateName(_:)
Classes/RVS_GTDevice.html#/c:@CM@RVS_GTD.abstract: Called when a peripheral’s name has changed.

Classes/RVS_GTDevice.html#/s:16RVS_GTDri.name: delegate
Classes/RVS_GTDevice.html#/s:16RVS_GTDri.abstract: This is our delegate instance. It can be nil.

Classes/RVS_GTDevice.html#/c:@CM@RVS_GTD.name: description
Classes/RVS_GTDevice.html#/c:@CM@RVS_GTD.abstract: Return the simple description (Manufacturer name, model and ID).

Classes/RVS_GTDevice.html#/c:@CM@RVS_GTD.name: isConnected
Classes/RVS_GTDevice.html#/c:@CM@RVS_GTD.abstract: This manages and reports our connection. Changing this value will connect or disconnect this device.

Classes/RVS_GTDevice.html#/c:@CM@RVS_GTD.name: manufacturerName
Classes/RVS_GTDevice.html#/c:@CM@RVS_GTD.abstract: This is the manufacturer name. It will be filled at initialization time.

Classes/RVS_GTDevice.html#/c:@CM@RVS_GTD.name: modelNumber
Classes/RVS_GTDevice.html#/c:@CM@RVS_GTD.abstract: This is the model number. It will be filled at initialization time.

Classes/RVS_GTDevice.html#/c:@CM@RVS_GTD.name: hardwareRevision
Classes/RVS_GTDevice.html#/c:@CM@RVS_GTD.abstract: This is the hardware revision. It will be filled at initialization time.

Classes/RVS_GTDevice.html#/c:@CM@RVS_GTD.name: firmwareRevision
Classes/RVS_GTDevice.html#/c:@CM@RVS_GTD.abstract: This is the firmware revision. It will be filled at initialization time.

Classes/RVS_GTDevice.html#/c:@CM@RVS_GTD.name: id
Classes/RVS_GTDevice.html#/c:@CM@RVS_GTD.abstract: This is the unique ID for the peripheral.

Classes/RVS_GTDevice.html#/s:16RVS_GTDri.name: goodbyeCruelWorld()
Classes/RVS_GTDevice.html#/s:16RVS_GTDri.abstract: If you call this, the driver will delete the device, and it will be eligible for rediscovery.

Classes/RVS_GTCharacteristic.html#/s:16R.name: sequence_contents
Classes/RVS_GTCharacteristic.html#/s:16R.abstract: This is a simple direct access to the characteristic descriptors.

Classes/RVS_GTCharacteristic.html#/c:@CM.name: value
Classes/RVS_GTCharacteristic.html#/c:@CM.abstract: Returns the value data for this characteristic.

Classes/RVS_GTCharacteristic.html#/c:@CM.name: stringValue
Classes/RVS_GTCharacteristic.html#/c:@CM.abstract: Returns the value of the characteristic, cast to a string. It may well be nil.

Classes/RVS_GTCharacteristic.html.name: RVS_GTCharacteristic
Classes/RVS_GTCharacteristic.html.abstract: This class wraps a CB characteristic, on behalf of the goTenna driver.

Classes/RVS_GTDevice.html.name: RVS_GTDevice
Classes/RVS_GTDevice.html.abstract: This class implements a single discovered goTenna device (in peripheral mode).

Classes/RVS_GTDriver.html.name: RVS_GTDriver
Classes/RVS_GTDriver.html.abstract: This class implements the main skeleton of the driver API.

Classes/RVS_GTService.html.name: RVS_GTService
Classes/RVS_GTService.html.abstract: This class implements a BLE service wrapper, specialized for the goTenna driver.
